name: Qbeat
description:
Feel the rhythm in your fingertips.
Put your senses to the test with this game of music, reflexes, and flashing lights. The better you follow the beat, the higher your score!
Challenge your friends and other players on the global leaderboard to find out who has the most rhythm!

HOW IT WORKS
The game is played on a grid of twelve cubes. Each cube will light up and rotate when it’s time to be tapped. Earn points and extra time with a well-timed hit, but be careful, off-beat taps will hurt your score! Every song is made up of a series of loops, and the final loop is endless. Play each loop well to complete a song at 100% (or even higher) to get the best score possible. Pass each level to unlock all of the music tracks!

FEATURES
– Easy to play, hard to master
– 6 original tracks created by redBit’s own Sound Designer
– Clean, minimalist design
– Detailed statistics to check your skills
– Worldwide leaderboards for each track

Qbeat is a rhythm game that will challenge your musical skills. Feel the beat!

If you're enjoying Qbeat, please remember to rate us on the store!

Do you have any feedback? We’d love to hear from you! Please send an email to: support@redbitgames.it
